design_system.core_philosophy: Energetic, Trustworthy, High-Contrast. The UI should feel like a high-end sports analytics suite used by pros. Dark backgrounds to reduce eye strain, with vibrant neon accents to highlight 'wins' and 'action'.

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero text, and key metrics. Tight tracking (-0.02em) for impact.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, labels, and data tables. High legibility.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Radial gradient top-center to simulate stadium lights: 'bg-[radial-gradient(ellipse_at_top,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-slate-900 via-slate-950 to-black'
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-slate-800. Active elements get a 'glow' effect using drop-shadow-lg shadow-emerald-500/20

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous padding (py-20, py-32) for sections. Tight spacing (gap-4) for data grids.
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid for dashboard. Asymmetric grid for landing page features.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). High contrast. Primary buttons should be 'brand-win' (Green) with black text for maximum visibility.

cards.style: Dark, flat or glass. No heavy shadows, rely on borders and subtle background differentiation.

images.description: Stadium night lights atmosphere. Use as a darkened background overlay for the Hero section.
images.usage: Hero Section Background (Overlay with opacity-80 black)

images.description: Friends cheering at a bar. Represents the 'Win' feeling.
Person holding smartphone. Use to frame the app UI.

images.usage: Call to Action (CTA) background or side image

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5 or 2. Sharp edges preferred.

implementation_instructions.step_1_setup: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and font families. Install 'lucide-react' if missing.
implementation_instructions.step_2_global_css: Inject the CSS variables into src/index.css. Ensure dark mode is default.
implementation_instructions.step_3_components: Customize Shadcn components (Card, Button, Input) to match the 'Stadium Night' theme. Remove rounded-xl, use rounded-sm.
implementation_instructions.step_4_pages: Build Landing Page first using the 'Hero' and 'Feature' assets. Then build Dashboard using the Bento Grid layout.
universal_rules: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
